featured.text: He must obtain a landing-visa at the CKS airport.
The shuttle does not use its engines for a landing.
When the shuttle touches the land, a drag parachute opens to steady the aircraft, get the speed right, and help the brakes on the landing-gear wheels to bring it to a complete stop. 49.

other.text: If it is necessary to stay more than 14 days and less than 30 days, nationals of the specific countries holding a 14-day non-visa entry should in the meantime apply for a landing-visa with the authorized office in the CKS airport from the Bureau of Consular Affairs of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
When an American lady wants to enter Taiwan for a one-week sight-seeing trip, one of the requirements is (A) to obtain a landing-visa at the CKS airport.
Which of the following is needed for a landing-visa? (A)

definition.en_def: The act of coming down to the ground or a surface after being in the air.
definition.example: The airplane is preparing for landing.
